name: zika
description: Mapping progression, risk factors, and response to the Zika virus

scripts.watch: npm run watch:es6 & npm run watch:css
scripts.build: true  && npm run build:libs  && npm run build:es6 && npm run build:css
scripts.dev: npm run build -s && (sleep 1 && npm run open -s) & npm run watch -s & npm run livereload -s & npm run serve
scripts.gist: echo 'Mapping progression, risk factors, and response to the Zika virus' > '..zika' && gistup && gistup-rename 'zika - Mapping progression, risk factors, and response to the Zika virus'
scripts.data: npm run data:cases:worldwide && npm run data:cases:us && git add -A && git commit -m 'data update'

author: nerik
